text: The 2019–20 Liga Națională season is the 70th season of the Liga Națională, the highest professional basketball league in Romania. This will be the season with a new format, with 16 teams divided into two groups based on results from the previous season. CSM U Oradea were the defending champions. On 13 March 2020, the league was suspended until 31 March because of the COVID-19 pandemic. == Teams == After withdrawing of Târgu Mureș, ACS Târgu Jiu replaced them in the competition. === Group A === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !City !Arena !Capacity |- |SCM Craiova |Craiova |Polyvalent Hall | align="center" |4,215 |- |Dinamo Stiinta București |Bucharest |Dinamo | align="center" |2,538 |- |CSM Oradea |Oradea |Arena Antonio Alexe | align="center" |2,000 |- |SCM Timișoara |Timișoara |Constantin Jude | align="center" |2,200 |- |CSU Sibiu |Sibiu |Transilvania | align="center" |3,000 |- | rowspan="2" |Steaua București | rowspan="2" |Bucharest |Mihai Viteazu | align="center" |2,000 |- |Polyvalent Hall | align="center" |3,500 |- | rowspan="2" |U-BT Cluj-Napoca | rowspan="2" |Cluj-Napoca |Polyvalent Hall | align="center" |7,308 |- |Horia Demian | align="center" |2,525 |- |BCMU FC Argeș |Pitești |Trivale | align="center" |2,000 |} === Group B === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !City !Arena !Capacity |- |Athletic |Constanța |Sala Sporturilor | align="center" |1,500 |- |CSM Focșani |Focșani |Vrancea | align="center" |1,400 |- |CSM Miercurea Ciuc |Miercurea Ciuc |Eröss Zsolt | align="center" |1,700 |- |CSM Galați |Galați |Dunărea | align="center" |1,500 |- |CSM Sighet |Sighetu Marmației |Dragoș Vodă | align="center" |200 |- |ACS Târgu Jiu |Târgu Jiu |Sala Sporturilor | align="center" |1500 |- |CSM Mediaș |Mediaș |Sala Sporturilor | align="center" |461 |- |CSO Voluntari |Voluntari |Gabriela Szabo | align="center" |1,100 |} ==Regular season== ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ==Second stage== ===Red Group=== ====League table==== ====Results==== ===Yellow Group=== ====League table==== ====Results==== ===Blue Group=== ====League table==== ====Results==== ==Romanian clubs in European competitions== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
